name: sizzlepig
tag_list: images, saas, design, developer, graphic-artist, batch, image-processing, web-development, photography
overview:
sizzlepig is a SaaS tool allowing for batch image resizing, cropping and fine tuning in the cloud, directly integrating with Dropbox.

Web Designers and Developers are expected to create images in multiple sizes and compressions for use on multiple types of digital and mobile devices. However, digital image processing still takes the labor-intensive work it did in the 90’s.

Much like manufacturing, a batch of material goes in and product comes out. The defects are hand-picked from the pile and redone manually. It is an ineffective and costly form of mass production.

This is why we developed sizzlepig™ — a software as a service (SaaS) tool integrating directly with Dropbox. sizzlepig resizes large numbers of images/pictures with precision. It eliminates defects, and creates craftsmanship quality pieces — all controlled visually. It also solves another common challenge: How to satisfy customer needs and increasing technology demands by producing high-quality images without increasing production costs.

This is a Global challenge and one that commonly bothered us at Grit Design, Inc. We knew we were wasting time in our own develoment efforts. That’s why we created sizzlepig.

Cost, time, quality, control, sizing and access (integrated directly with Dropbox) are welcomed results by anyone who has to create and produce images. Made for anyone working with images, such as Ad Agencies, businesses, freelancers, photographers, architects and more.
